title: Could you help me for the warranty?
content:
Hello,
I bought a pixel 3 from Amazon last July.
It has been used for less than a year, and there is currently a problem of battery drain.
I have made a warranty request to Google before,
but Google only responds, the warranty period is until 07/31 of this year, and the rest of the warranty needs must be submitted to Amazon.
However, Amazon customer service said that,
" Amazon will accept any return within 30 days of the date it was delivered. In this case, I would suggest that you contact the manufacturer. You still have a couple of weeks within the warranty date they provided you. "
" I believe that other companies are not aware of Amazon≈õ policy so they just say that. However, Google should not give you any issues exchanging, fixing, or providing you with replacement pieces within the year warranty. "
So I want to know,
could you help me for the warranty?
Thank you.
